## Making multivariate statistics reproducible

Script.rmd represent the R notebook. Data is collected from PubChem Assay: AID 624202 (AID_624202_datatable.csv). The data is a AHTS assay to identify small molecule activators of BRCA1 expression. From this dataset a descriptor matrix is computed (descriptors.csv) (reference: https://github.com/egonw/scientificProgramming/blob/master/assignment%202/descriptors.Rmd.
